scriptLines:
query: 'select
    0 id,
    codigo,
    nombre,
    descipcion,
    isactive,     
    isdefault,
    posicion,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(fechaAlta, 'T', ' ') ,'Z','')fecha, 
     REPLACE(REPLACE(fechaModificacion, 'T', ' ') ,'Z','')  fechaModificacion,
    companyid ,
    slaTargetPriority1RespondWithin     ,
    slaTargerPriority1ResolveWithin     , 
    slaTargetPriority2RespondWithin     ,
    slaTargerPriority2ResolveWithin     ,   
    slaTargetPriority3RespondWithin     ,
    slaTargerPriority3ResolveWithin     ,    
    slaTargetPriority4RespondWithin     ,
    slaTargerPriority4ResolveWithin     
from Sla',
